decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6d1d64e8-7fff-b18b-09b4-035cb7d9a7c6"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed development, by reason of its design, position, location, </span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">scale, and massing </span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">would result in an incompatible and obtrusive form of development which would result in the loss of the original distinctive hipped and valley roof of the building, and would adversely affect the character and appearance of the Northwold and Cazenove Conservation Area and the terrace that it forms part of. As such the proposal is contrary to policies,&nbsp; </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character),&nbsp; LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets), of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 and policies D4 (Delivering good design) and HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth) of the London Plan 2021, and Hackney, 'Residential Extensions and Alterations' SPD 2009</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">. </span></p>
description: Erection of a mansard design roof extension.
